PreCompact.description: memcord: auto-save progress before context compaction
PreCompact.prompt: The conversation context is about to be compacted. Use the memcord_save_progress tool to save a summary of the current conversation. Pass the key points, decisions, code changes, and progress from this session as the chat_text parameter. Do NOT specify a slot_name â€” let the server auto-detect it. If the save fails because no slot is active, silently continue. Do not ask the user for confirmation.

SessionEnd.description: memcord: auto-save and close slot on session end
SessionEnd.prompt: The session is ending. Use the memcord_save_progress tool to save a brief summary of the current conversation (key points, decisions, code changes, outcomes) as chat_text. Do NOT specify a slot_name. Then use the memcord_close tool to deactivate the current slot. If either call fails because no slot is active, silently continue without error.
